        				<h2 class="entry-title"><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-fall-quarter-week-1-first-general-meeting-2/" rel="bookmark">WICS Fall Quarter Week 1: First General Meeting</a></h2>        			</div>
        			
        		</div>

        	</div><!--.blog-header-wrap-->
			<p>Last Monday, September 30th, WICS hosted its first General Meeting for fall quarter. One hundred fifty people RSVP’d for this event! Members had a chance to grab some pizza and drinks and socialize with other members, as well as committee and board members. Co-presidents Cheyenne Chavez and Sharon Hsu led <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-fall-quarter-week-1-first-general-meeting-2/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

        				        			<div class="entry-header-title">

        		</div>

        	</div><!--.blog-header-wrap-->
			<p>On Monday, May 6, WICS hosted a study session, where students could meet up with friends and club members to help each other study for midterms and work on projects. The members helped each other with homework and gave advice and support to everyone. It was a great night to <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-spring-quarter-week-6-study-session/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

			<p>On Monday, April 29, WICS’ community outreach committee hosted their Intro to Web Design event! This event was a beginner level workshop open to all majors.
